name: Custom URL for Elementor
author: WooLogger

sections.description:
Custom URL for Elementor enhances Elementor by allowing you to add clickable URLs to Container, Section, Column, and Inner Section elements. This feature enables you to create more interactive and navigable designs within Elementor.

Features:

  • Add custom URLs to Elementor Container elements
  • Add custom URLs to Elementor Section elements
  • Add custom URLs to Elementor Column elements
  • Add custom URLs to Elementor Inner Section elements
  • Option to open links in a new tab
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/custom-url-for-elementor directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Use the new ‘Custom URL’ options in Elementor’s editor for Container, Section, Column, and Inner Section elements.
sections.faq:
Does this plugin work with the latest version of Elementor?

Yes, this plugin is compatible with the latest version of Elementor.

Can I add custom URLs to other Elementor elements?

Currently, this plugin only supports adding custom URLs to Container, Section, Column, and Inner Section elements.

short_description: Adds custom URL functionality to Elementor's "Container", "Section", "Column", and "Inner Section" elements.
